name: Sweet Science – The Girls from Silversee Castle (Demo)
name_original: Sweet Science – The Girls from Silversee Castle (Demo)
description:
This is a demo for "Sweet Science", the first AI-generated visual novel! All graphics in this game were produced with the help of an AI software (NovelAI).

The full VN will contain five good endings (four of them romantic), several minigames and an original story full of twists and surprises... and we also plan for an original song by Emilia!

Plot

Find yourself sent back in time – at a weird science camp in a prestigious boarding school in Silversee Castle. Will you solve the mystery of how you ended up there? And will you be able to return to your time? Or will you find love?

Characters

Meet Azuki, the mysterious astronomy girl, Marie, the shy math genius, Patricia, the hyper-energy physicist, and Sylvia, the baroness who couldn't care less about all these nerds, and dive into the adventure of your life!

How to get the full game

The demo only contains the first part of the story, but if you play it through and register, the full game will be available for you for free, as soon as it is completed!

More about AI art

Want to learn more about the AI technology used to make such stunning graphics? Maybe even want to do your own AI-generated visual novel? Then take a look here https://the-last-secret.mozellosite.com/news/ for hands-on tips and tricks!
